#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        int t;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--) {
                long long int a,n;
                scanf("%lld",&n);
                if(n%49==0) {
                        a=n/49;
                if(a%7==0)
                        printf("NO\n");
                else
                        printf("YES\n");
                }
                else
                        printf("NO\n");
        }
        return 0;
}
